https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/iP7UZBq2AR2etwdcxxEAtsM3jyf.jpg Contemporary Moscow. Sasha Titov is a successful executive, reveling in the single life. One day, a ten-year-old girl, Alya, shows up at his penthouse, claiming to be his daughter. Can this incorrigible bachelor learn to be a father? Breakfast at Dad's
